oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Construction of multi-qubit optimal genuine entanglement witnesses
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Han, Kyung Hoon
Kye, Seung-Hyeok
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quantum Physics
81P15, 15A30, 46L05, 46L07
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We interpret multi-partite genuine entanglement witnesses as simultaneous positivity of various maps arising from them. We apply this result to multi-qubit {\sf X}-shaped Hermitian matrices, and characterize the conditions for them to be genuine entanglement witnesses, in terms of entries. Furthermore, we find all optimal ones among them. They turn out to have the spanning properties, and so they detect non-zero volume set of multi-qubit genuine entanglement. We also characterize decomposability for {\sf X}-shaped entanglement witnesses.
Comment: 17 pages, to appear in Journal of Physics A: Mathematical and Theoretical
